caption: This place is so great! The food is always delicious and fresh. Buffalo cauliflower and fried oyster mushroom sandwich are my top highlights! Their fries and sauces are really delicious as well.

It can be pretty hard to find tasty vegan food. I ordered from TRI for the first time today, and if my order (pancakes & avocado toast) is any indication, my search for delicious, 100% plant-based food is over! J, who took my order over the …
I am not vegan and I enjoyed my meal.
Food was grwat
Great Vegan food, nice to see a variety of dishes that are plant based

Absolutely disgusting and not worth it... The pizza I could’ve made myself if we’re being honest, the chili fries are gross and ghetto. Just a total disappointment for a vegan restaurant especially in Staten Island! Please don’t get me started on the “cornbread” or brownie😞
Yummy... the veggies were the BEST, then the fries,then the Mac cheese, the fried chik/mushroom,...will be there again...
I order from y’all all the time, and still have the audacity to cancel my order, after waiting 2 full hours. Terrible
The soul food tray with fried chicken, Mac and cheese, mashed potatoes and corn bread was amazing! So well seasoned and tasty!

I love TRI Lounge. Their grandma slice pizza is probably one of my favorite vegan pizzas!! Its so delicious. The burgers are great too. Definitely worth trying this spot and eating some good vegan food ☺️
I love you guys💜
Great vegan pizza!
I ordered the tomato soup. It was delicious. The owner was friendly & courteous.
The scrambled eggs were delicious! Definitely would reorder.

Came here on a Sunday afternoon. The staff are very friendly and the food is good too! I ordered the grilled cheese with tomato soup and it was delicious! My fiancé is vegan so we’ve been trying out restaurants that work for the both of us and I have to say TRI did not disappoint.
Pizza is amazing!!
Nice place with great food!  Pizza is good and burger are my personal favorites!  I highly recommend!
EXCELLENT!!! Best vegan pizza on the island by far. Amazing vegan food here in general, generous portions, super worth it. I'd recommend it to all.
They are the only spot I find with pineapple pizza hurrah pineapple pizza I’m coming !!!!!!
Excellent Food and Servicd

The space actually is a vibe visually but due to covid you cannot dine in. I called in my order.  Simple.  The wait was 25 minutes so I waited before I headed over. When I arrived,  my food was ready.
The food was INSANELY tasty!!! Best vegan spot I’ve tried and the Mac and cheese is to DIE for!!!!
It was fast enough attendants

The space actually is a vibe visually but due to covid you cannot dine in. I called in my order.  Simple.  The wait was 25 minutes so I waited before I headed over. When I arrived,  my food was ready.  The cashier was pleasant. I ordered …
Best burger and fries on Staten Island
The best vegan place on Staten Island! Friendly owner & staff and the food is always so delicious and flavorful!
v good vegan food the Mac and cheese rules
great food
The pizza is good but the  fried chicken (mushroom ) was not fried good half fried wet flour 😔the Buffalo cauliflower was mushy  😔

I definitely recommend TRI Lounge to everyone, even if they aren’t vegan. The food is super good and the service is even better. Such a nice atmosphere, it’s too bad the pandemic doesn’t let us sit indoors these days because they have a …
My favorite place to eat on Staten Island since I first moved here!! Great customer service, and even better food!

Where to start! Can't wait to come back and try more. The mac and cheese beyond burger was delish, def recommend asking for more cheese sauce on the side and getting the chili cheese fries on the side! Got the triple sample plate with mac …
Probably the tastiest Strawberry shake!!!!!!!!
TRI's Philly cheese steak is awesome. . . such great favors!!! I cannot wait to order this again. . .😎👍🏻

Food was amazing ! Large portions. Well seasoned, and the staff was friendly. I had the soul tray with fried oyster mushroom chicken, candied yams, and collard greens 🤤🤤 also a side of Mac. I will be back.
I thought I made a pretty good tofu scramble but the tofu scramble here is a breakfast dream. Tri Lounge is such an inviting space with great food and I’m so grateful it exists on Staten Island.
Very good food! Spiced and flavorful. I had the Mac a cheese, buffalo cauliflower, "chicken" sandwich and a cheese pizza. Each item was delicious in their own way. Definitely returning for more.
Very nice and peaceful place to eat

We went to TRI for breakfast so this rating is based on the breakfast.  The scrambled eggs were delicious! Definitely would reorder.  The pancakes were a stack of 4 and very filling. I’d suggest sharing this plate. Tasty dish as well.  I …

BBQ Cauliflower pizza is a must try! So so so delicious. This week they have special brownies made by Sweets by Kricket (@nycvegeats on instagram) and those were absolutely incredible - grab them while you can!

I wanted to order from a black owned vegan business butttt idk whos the cook on staff tonight but my food was NOT IT :( first off. My "fries" aren't fried lol they're more like baked. And there's only a few of them. I'm a person that loves …
There is nothing vegan about me lol, but I loooove this place.  Their Buffalo  cauliflower, Mac and cheese and cornbread😍😍😍😍😍

There's no better vegan food on Staten Island than TRI Lounge & Cafe. I can confidently say this because I've tried it all. Most of the vegan food on the island lacks flavor. TRI Lounge & Cafe does not. The Buffalo cauliflower "wings" and …

I live one door down & just CANNOT GET ENOUGH of their TRI Cheeseburger with a side of fries. I'm no vegan & generally don't get vegan but the flavor is just so juicy and the way they crisp the side of their buns... call me the luckiest neighbor ever. Anytime my friends are over, we already know to get from here.

This plant based establishment is definitely worth a visit! I discovered it after COVID so I wasn’t able to experience what it was like when it was open to the public, but walking inside to order & viewing the funky fly decor, community …
Buffalo cauliflower was amazing. Chilli chesse fries and Mac and cheese taste just as good 😋
Food and service was amazing.  Will be back! Bbq cauliflower was incredible 🤩
Food was amazing. Staff was awesome. Mac&cheese was amazing.

Vegan or not, this is good food, period. Had it for the first time yesterday and had to get it again today. Really surprised to see this place on Staten Island. I ordered a variety of things off the menu- everything exploding with flavor, it's insane. Go here and support this place!
The food and service here is great. My favorite dish to get is the soul bowl. You get comfort food without the guilt.

The food was flavorless. Black pepper makes it hot, NOT flavorful. The cupcakes and cookies were stale and inedible. The batter for the fried “chicken” wasn’t cooked thoroughly. The Mac and cheese was burned and NOT in a good way and lacked …
Nice friendly staff. The best mac n cheese and bbq cauliflower...incredible!! 😋
Amazing vegan food! Delicious breakfast, great lunch and dinner options! Soul bowls are the best! The cornbread is perfect!!! Will return soon!
DEFINITELY get the buffalo wings - they are incredible.

The food was ok. I did not like the mac and cheese. It had a superficial taste and was dry. The chili cheese dog was soggy and had little flavor. The traditional veggie burger was the worst. It tasted like the veggie white castle burger on …

I went there an hour before they closed. The door was locked and the employees inside were looking at me like I was crazy. I knocked on the door and they continued to look at me and do nothing. Very rude and very weird.

Although it was confusing ordering and I waited well over an hour for my meal, the FOOD made up for it. I had the soul trio with the fried "chicken" collards and yams and when I tell you it was Thanksgiving 1999 all over again! I forgot the …
Its a down to earth restaurant....clean and hip...Owner is really cool..
All the food is delicious! I especially loved the chili, bbq burger, yams and the buffalo cauliflower.

I felt adventurous today and decided to eat here because I haven’t had a cheat day in a long time. I tried various kinds of foods but never have I ever had soul food. I went here for my cheat day and I have to say, I absolutely love this …
So Dope!
Food was fantastic! Places like this make me want to fully commit to vegan. Would highly recommend to anyone vegan or not!
GREAT FOOD & GAMES WHILE YOU WAIT! 😁
Had the tri burger! Let me tell you...AMAZINGG!! Can't wait to go back and try the rest of the menu! FINALLY A GOOD VEGAN PLACE ON THE ISLAND!
Good tasteful food
Food is amazing. My picky eater loved it!
This place is so so good! Jay makes the absolute best cheese, all of the food is bomb.  I have to resist buying the menu every time I'm at TRI.
Food was great!! Loved the mac & cheese, tomato soup and the buffalo cauliflower wings were amazing.
Not vegan... yet!!! But really enjoy the food!!!
The food is fantastic! The owner is very genuine and polite. Price is very reasonable
Fun and friendly ! Yummy and timely ! Affordable & trendy !!!

I went for the first time two weeks ago, and I’ve been going constantly ever since. The food is fresh and delicious. The owner is very kind and welcoming. Her remembers you, and is always asking for feedback. I’ve tried their pizza, …

It was so good I ordered twice in one week. The burger is Thee best! Vegan burger I've ever tasted.. Ever! Chili cheese fries was good and the Brownie had a strong cocoa taste, soft and a bit chewy. Better than a real Brownie.
Best vegan restaurant in Staten Island. Classy and genuine staff. Great seasoned food. Overall great
Food is absolutely delicious 😋
I took a friend here for her birthday to try Vegan food for the first time and she loved everything!  From the Broccoli & Cheese Soup, Mac & Cheese and Chili Cheese Fries were delicious!

I LOVED the buffalo cauliflower it’s better than chicken. It’s Soo good and light. The flavor, texture, smell and presentation combined! I also had the traditional veggie burger with Tri sauce. Its light, healthy, smooth, and tasty and delicious 😋.WILL BE COMING BACK!
This is the perfect hangout spot. Music is great, open mic nights on Wednesdays are always fun! and of course the food is delicious and FRESHLY made!

I went here for the first time last night.  We had the buffalo cauliflower, butter noodles, mac & cheese, chili cheese fries, a lemon cupcake and the banana frozen dessert.  Every single thing we had was delicious, the prices were good, and …
everything was delicious and the staff is super friendly!! I will definitely be back for another mac and cheese burger :)

Appreciate a new plant-based spot on Staten Island! The staff was very friendly and prompt in service. The pizza was out when we went, but they accommodated by adding extra veggies to the pasta with marinara, which was pretty tasty. I also …

Me and my daughter are regular hunters of Vegan spots all over the tri state area. We were both thrilled to find this amazing place right here on our Island.  Gota say they did a fantastic job on there Mac and cheese and chili cheese fries , looking forward to trying them again and hope they do well.
Healthy delicious food! A must try!!
Awesome new vegan place! Super new to the game but the potential is huge! Rad place for gigs and other things. Yummy vegan soul food for a good price from good people. 🖤

This cozy and intimate venue is exactly what Staten Island has been hoping for. This space is conveniently located on the north shore with ample access to public transportation, and PARKING! If your looking for a place to indulge in great talent and delicious food, look no further.

Tri Lounge surpassed my expectations.  Trying to eat healthy on the island can be not only difficult but expensive... this place addresses both of those concerns with ease. My brother and I went early afternoon *they open at 2pm, and were …
Great food. Amazing staff. And all for a good price!
This place has such a great atmosphere! I love the food and the music is always great. I would highly recommend
Awesome business that finally offers great plant based food and supports local artists! If you want to get your name and talent out there, please check out TRI.
great atmosphere, great food! 10/10 would recommend
Great food, amazing hangout
Great food! The candied yams are amazing!
This place is so chill. Love the atmosphere and the burgers.
Incredible vegan food and a very low price. I wish I lived locally, I’d eat here daily!!!
love the atmosphere
